Read PURPLE CNV Germline File

Source: R/purple.R
purple_cnv_germ_read.Rd

Reads the purple.cnv.germline.tsv file.

purple_cnv_germ_read(x)

Arguments

x

Path to purple.cnv.germline.tsv file.

Value

The input file as a tibble.

Examples

x <- system.file("extdata/purple/purple.cnv.germline.tsv", package = "gpgr")
(p <- purple_cnv_germ_read(x))
#> # A tibble: 67 × 16
#>    chromosome     start       end copyNumber bafCount observedBAF   baf
#>    <chr>          <int>     <int>      <dbl>    <dbl>       <dbl> <dbl>
#>  1 chr1         7510001   7511000    -0.0049        0           0 0.982
#>  2 chr1        14110001  14113000     0.416         0           0 0.982
#>  3 chr1        15825001  15829000     0.350         0           0 0.982
#>  4 chr1        58278001  58279000     0.338         0           0 0.982
#>  5 chr1        61617001  61618000     0.146         0           0 0.982
#>  6 chr1        79756001  79757000     0.0277        0           0 0.982
#>  7 chr1        85935001  85939000     0.173         0           0 0.982
#>  8 chr1        89010001  89013000     0.0799        0           0 0.982
#>  9 chr1       105473001 105481000     0.120         0           0 0.982
#> 10 chr1       110834001 110845000     0.0083        0           0 0.982
